job.title: Senior Principal Consultant -Data Scientist: Analytics Specialist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Desired Requirement: This position requires that the aaplicant possess a U.S. Top Secret/SCI security clearance with a Full Scope Poly. If the appliant does not possess a Full Scope Poly consideration will be given to applicants who possess a lesser clearance and/or background check. U.S. Citizenship is manadatory.  Oracle’s National Security Group/Consulting is looking for a Data Scientist: Analytics Specialist to strengthen our ability to deliver unique, intuitive, and exciting analytic applications and data concepts for our innovative emerging technologies. We’re charting new territory in analytic enablement---and need imaginative and talented DS analytic specialists to provide new ways to select, see, use, and exploit data. We’re solving difficult analytic problems and empowering users through dynamic, flexible, and intuitive capabilities. We’re seeking high performing candidates to design and implement novel mechanisms that enable users to collate data, discover insights, unearth buried tidbits, and tell compelling analytic stories. This role will design technologies, pioneer advanced algorithms, and implement top-level analytic innovations. We want someone with an extensive background in data analytics who loves to work with multi-disciplinary teams to construct truly revolutionary ways to enable analysis. We need individuals who can incorporate ideas from diverse perspectives and distill challenging problems into effective capabilities--including ways to understand, consume, and enhance data. You’ll advocate for advancements that you know will resonate with the user. You’ll impact and influence how analysis is done. An experienced consulting professional who has a broad understanding of solutions, industry best practices, multiple business processes or technology designs within a product/technology family. Operates independently to provide quality work products to an engagement. Performs varied and complex duties and tasks that need independent judgment, in order to implement Oracle products and technology to meet customer needs. Applies Oracle methodology, company procedures, and leading practices.  Operates independently to provide quality work products to an engagement. Performs varied and complex duties and tasks that need independent judgment, in order to implement Oracle products and technology to meet customer needs. Applies Oracle methodology, company procedures, and leading practices. Demonstrates expertise to deliver functional and technical solutions on moderately complex customer engagements. May lead the solution design and implementation aspects of engagement(s) ensuring high quality, integrated software solutions within constraints of time and budget. May act as the team lead on projects, providing coaching, guidance and feedback to develop skills of team members. Effectively consults with management of customer organizations. Participates in business development activities. Develops and leads detailed solutions for moderately complex projects.  6-8 years of experience relevant to this position including 3-4 years consulting experience preferred. Undergraduate degree or equivalent experience preferred. Product or technical expertise relevant to practice focus. Ability to communicate effectively. Ability to build rapport with team members and clients. Ability to travel as needed. Innovation starts with inclusion at Oracle. We are committed to creating a workplace where all kinds of people can be themselves and do their best work. It’s when everyone’s voice is heard and valued, that we are inspired to go beyond what’s been done before. That’s why we need people with diverse backgrounds, beliefs, and abilities to help us create the future, and are proud to be an affirmative-action equal opportunity employer.  Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.
